trans-unit.source: Provides methods for writing audio data and events.
trans-unit.target: 오디오 데이터 및 이벤트를 쓰기 위한 메서드를 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Determines the action or actions the engine should perform.
trans-unit.target: 엔진은 수행 해야 하는 작업을 결정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_int" name="int" href=""></xref> containing the sum of one or more members of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_TtsEngineAction" name="TtsEngineAction" href=""></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_int" name="int" href=""> </xref> 의 하나 이상의 멤버의 합계를 포함 하는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_TtsEngineAction" name="TtsEngineAction" href=""> </xref> 열거 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Adds one or more events to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_EventInterest" name="EventInterest" href=""></xref> property.
trans-unit.target: 하나 이상의 이벤트를 추가 하는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_EventInterest" name="EventInterest" href=""> </xref> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref uid="langword_csharp_SpeechEventInfo" name="SpeechEventInfo" href=""></xref> objects.
The size of the array.
Returns the number of items skipped.
The number of items skipped.
Determines the events the engine should raise.
trans-unit.target: 엔진을 발생 시킬 이벤트를 결정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Each bit in the `EventInterest` flag field represents a type of event that the engine should raise.
trans-unit.target: 각 비트를 `EventInterest` 플래그 필드는 엔진을 발생 시킬 이벤트의 유형을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_int" name="int" href=""></xref> containing the sum of one or more members of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_TtsEventId" name="TtsEventId" href=""></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_int" name="int" href=""> </xref> 의 하나 이상의 멤버의 합계를 포함 하는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_TtsEventId" name="TtsEventId" href=""> </xref> 열거 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns the number and type of items to be skipped.
trans-unit.target: 건너뛸 수와 항목의 형식을 반환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns the number and type of items to be skipped.
trans-unit.target: 건너뛸 수와 항목의 형식을 반환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Loads the resource at the specified URI.
The URI of the resource.
The media type of the resource.
Loads the resource at the specified URI.
Gets the speaking rate of the engine.
An <xref uid="langword_csharp_int" name="int" href=""></xref> containing the speaking rate.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_int" name="int" href=""> </xref> 속도 말하기 포함 된 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the speaking volume of the engine.
An <xref uid="langword_csharp_int" name="int" href=""></xref> containing the speaking volume.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_int" name="int" href=""> </xref> 말하기 볼륨을 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Outputs audio data.
The location of the output audio data.
The number of items in the output audio stream.
trans-unit.target: 출력 오디오 스트림에 있는 항목의 수입니다.

trans-unit.source: Outputs audio data.
